PopDogs is messing in the amusement park, you must stop them. But once you pop, can't stop even yourself.

# The most popular classic game is coming back with all new experiences & design:
[ New Block Role - 5 Styles of Dog ]
[ New UI with Perfect Arts ]
[ New Gears Designed for the Incredible Record ]
[ New Original Music & SFX make you enjoy all the time ]

# How to Play:
[ Just tap two or more dogs of the same color ]
[ There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage ]
[ Magic-Dogs can help you to change the color of dogs during playing ]

# Tips on Scoring:
[ The more dogs you pop, the more score you will get ]
[ Try to clear all dog, you will get a lot of bonus ]

-----------------------
Example of Rule #1
(Formula: Score = Dogs * Dogs * 5)
2 Dogs = 20
3 Dogs = 45
4 Dogs = 80
...
10 Dogs = 500
...
20 Dogs = 2000

Example of Rule #2
(Formula: Bonus = 2000 - Dogs * Dogs * 20)
10 Dogs Left = 0
9 Dogs Left = 380
8 Dogs Left = 720
...
All Dog Cleared = 2000
-----------------------

# Features:
[ Autosave when terminated or get a call ]
[ iPhone5 & iOS6 Support Perfectly ]
